auth.token_invalidated: Token invalidated due to password change
auth.admin_email_not_verified: Email verification required for admin access
auth.email_not_verified: Email verification required to access this feature. Please verify your email first.
auth.premium_required: This feature is exclusive to Premium subscribers. Upgrade your plan to access.

password.reset_email_sent: If the email exists, you will receive recovery instructions
password.too_short: Password must be at least 8 characters
password.missing_uppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
password.missing_lowercase: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter
password.missing_digit: Password must contain at least one number
password.missing_special: Password must contain at least one special character

validation.must_accept_terms: You must accept the terms of service and privacy policy

chart.pdf_generating: PDF is being generated. Please wait.
chart.unverified_chart_limit: You have reached the limit of {limit} charts for unverified accounts. Please verify your email to create more charts.
chart.unverified_pdf_blocked: PDF generation is only available for verified accounts. Please verify your email to unlock this feature.
chart.access_denied: You don't have access to this birth chart
chart.not_calculated: Chart has not been calculated yet
chart.data_not_available: Chart data not available for this locale
chart.processing_unavailable: Chart processing unavailable. Please try again later.
chart.pdf_not_generated: PDF not generated yet. Call POST /charts/{id}/generate-pdf first.
chart.still_processing: Chart is still processing. Please wait until calculations are complete.
chart.pdf_already_generating: PDF is already being generated for this chart. Please wait for the current generation to complete.
chart.s3_download_failed: Failed to generate download URL. Please try again.

common.rate_limit_exceeded: Rate limit exceeded. Please try again in a few minutes.
common.insufficient_credits: This feature requires {required} credits. You have {available} credits available.

saturn_return.saturn_not_found: Saturn data not found in chart

solar_return.sun_not_found: Sun data not found in chart
solar_return.invalid_year_range: End year must be greater than or equal to start year

oauth.redirect_uri_not_configured: Redirect URI for {provider} is not configured
oauth.cannot_disconnect_last: Cannot disconnect last OAuth provider without setting a password first
oauth.failed_to_retrieve_user_info: Failed to retrieve required user information from OAuth provider

storage.file_too_large: File too large. Maximum size is {max_size}MB

admin.cannot_remove_last_admin: Cannot remove role from last admin

stripe.already_subscribed: You already have an active subscription. Use the customer portal to manage it.
stripe.no_billing_account: No billing account found. Please subscribe first.
stripe.cancelled_at_period_end: Your subscription will be cancelled at the end of the billing period.
stripe.cancelled_immediately: Your subscription has been cancelled immediately.
stripe.not_scheduled_for_cancellation: Subscription is not scheduled for cancellation

email.footer_copyright: Â© {year} Real Astrology. All rights reserved.
email.button_not_working: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
email.password_reset_intro: We received a request to reset the password for your Real Astrology account.
email.password_reset_action: If you made this request, click the button below to create a new password:
email.password_reset_ignore: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your password will remain unchanged.
email.password_changed_success: Your password has been changed successfully.
email.password_changed_warning: If you did not make this change, please contact our support immediately.
email.verify_email_intro: Thank you for signing up with Real Astrology. To start using all the platform features, we need to verify your email address.
email.verify_email_action: Click the button below to verify your email:
email.verify_email_ignore: If you did not create an account with Real Astrology, please ignore this email.
